scenario_text.value: What should I do...?
Ho ho ho...
You, you’re Arukenimon! Wh-what do you want?!
Guys! The enemy’s here! Arukenimon...!
Guys...?

Oh my, poor thing... Totally unaware that
you’ve been separated from the pack.

I, I have to...oh, right! T-talk! I’m here to
TALK!

You’re intelligent, right?! Let’s talk it
out! Okay?!
Well, if you insist. Go on, then. Talk. ♪
Uh...fantastic...

Instead of fighting us, all of you would
rather go back to your own world, yes?

Yes, exactly! We just want to get home
safely, that’s all!
We never wanted to hurt any of you!

If that’s the case, then I suppose I can let
you go home.
...Really?!
However... ♪

You need to provide some compensation in
return. That sounds reasonable, yes?
I’ll give you anything! Just name it!
We need a sacrifice... A single one will do.
So give us just one person... Ho ho ho.
Really? Just one?!
Ho ho ho ho...
Shuuji!
Just one, right? Right, Arukenimon?!

...Is Arukenimon there, Shuuji? Where,
exactly?

Ain’t no one there. Jeez, man...our boy’s
freakin’ lost it, hasn’t he?

If Arukenimon’s not there... Then who’s he
talking to?
He must be seeing another illusion!
Snap out of it, Shuuji!
Just one... Just one... Who to choose...

No, I... I can’t... There’s no way I can make
that choice...!
Hey! Where are you going?!
Tch...
Dammit, Shuuji, stop right there!

You can’t even hear our voices any more?!
And you think you’re our leader?!
Leader... I’m...the leader...

Say something, punk! You waste of space!
Dumpster fire!
Uh, Ryo, isn’t that going a bit too far?

Don’t sweat it, I’m just trying to snap him
out of it, is all.
Still, that’s...

You heard him, didn’t you? That guy’s been
going “Dad,” “Dad.”

Huh? Yeah, uh, he must’ve been showed
a vision of his dad, then.

Just look out how shaken up he is. He must
have some nasty trauma about his dad.
Trauma...?

Can’t say for sure, but that reaction ain’t
normal.
I bet...he’s like me.

The obsession I have with my mom, and the
feelings he has about his dad. Seem similar.
So...what should we do?

I wouldn’t be yelling like this if I knew!
We just gotta get through to him!

I know! Me! The sacrifice should be ME!
That would work, right, Arukenimon?!
After him! I’ve got a bad feeling about this!
Yeah. Let’s go, guys!

Answer me, Arukenimon! I’ll be the sacrifice!
Take me!

What admirable spirit... Still, is that what
you really want, my dear boy?

You lack courage...and your sense of justice
is nothing special. Don’t you think?

You’re just frightened, and you want to leave
this place behind.

You’d rather pass the buck on to someone else.
Isn’t that true?

No doubt about it! He’s again stuck in an
illusion! One just for him!
Just what the enemy wants!
*sniff* *sniff* That scent... Arukenimon!

Shuuji’s seeing a vision of Arukenimon! Why
didn’t I realize it before?!

I thought something was wrong. Those fakes
seemed more like they were buying time.

Arukenimon was aiming for Shuuji from the
start!

She lured him away from us, and kept showing
him these visions...

He’s been seeing something this whole time,
and we had no idea!
Shuuji... Wait for me!
Ah, hey! Lopmon ran off on his own!
After him! We have to rescue Shuuji!

Lopmon’s going after him! If we follow, we’re
sure to catch them!

No! I want to save everyone... That’s all
I need!

My dad will finally be proud of me! More, way
more than my brother!
Urgh... *huff*...*huff*...

Well, then. If you really feel that way, why
don’t we let this one do the honors?
Grrrwwwlll...
Waaaaaaaaaugh! No, not that! Stay away!

See, now there’s your true colors.
You’re afraid of death, aren’t you?
Of course I am! Who wouldn’t be?!

No... I don’t want to die! Not in a place
like this! NOOOOOO!
It’s okay, Shuuji! I’ll protect you!

Oops, so sorry, dear. I’m afraid you’re of no
use here.
Waugh! Rrrk, you won’t beat me!
Yaaaaaaugh!

Seriously?! That’s your idea of protecting
me?!

Don’t make promises unless you can deliver!
You... You useless thing!

And fight better! If you were better at
fighting, I might not be in this mess!

You can’t even evolve! Maybe you’d be of
some use if you could!

Yeah! If you were more useful,
I could even defeat my enemies!

Enemies... Anyone who looks down on me! You
should just erase them all!
Even my dad...even my brother! Everyone!
So evolve already! Right now!
Stop, Shuuji!

Why, why am I so hopeless...? Is this all
I really am?!

At this rate...
I won’t get out of this alive!

How can I possibly survive? Where... Where
is there a place for me?!

What are you doing, Shuuji?! That’s Lopmon!
Can’t you see?
You can’t do that!

Lopmon’s gonna die! What should we do,
Takuma?!
